# mattmc3.github.io

My blog at [https://mattmc3.github.io](https://mattmc3.github.io).

## Helpers

Generate post date:

```
date +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%z"
```

## Hugo

Testing:

```sh
$ hugo server
```

Theme:
- [https://github.com/tomowang/hugo-theme-tailwind](https://github.com/tomowang/hugo-theme-tailwind)
